talents.name: Commune with Divinity
effect: Maintain your Composure at Challenge 3 to align yourself with the divine. Gain Hits in Concordance. Your Concordance measures how closely you are aligned with your Divine Doctrine.
You may use this Ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint.  If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 8 - Steady Actions (minimum 1 Action).

talents.name: Divine Doctrine
effect:
You follow set of principles in your belief system or religious practice, referred to as your Divine Doctrine. Each Divine Doctrine consists of Virtues, Taboos, and Domains.
When you act against your Virtues or engage in a Taboo, reduce your Concordance by 1.

Select two items from the list below to be your Virtues and two items to be your Taboos:
Temperance, Indulgence, Avarice, Charity, Humility, Compassion, Wrath, Courage, Deceipt, Justice, Loyalty, Honesty . . .

Select 2 Effect Skills from the list below to be your Domain:
Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nox, Rime, Tempest, Vivus

Commitment to your Divine Doctrine lets you access Rites. When one of your Rites is unsuccessful or the result set contains a 1, reduce your Concordance by 1.
If you attempt to use a Rite when you Concordance is below 0, add 1 Hazard die to the roll for each point your Concordance is below 0.

talents.name: Composure (2)
effect: Increase your Composure rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Domain (2)
effect: Increase one of your Domains ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Domain (2)
effect: Increase one of your Domains ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Domain (3)
effect: Increase one of your Domains ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Seek Mysteries
effect: You hold knowledge of the mysteries of the cosmos, bending secret powers to your will. You gain access to Arcana.

When you gain this Talent, select 2 Effect Skills from the list below to be your Foci which determine the Arcana you can access:
Aether, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nihil, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest, Torrent, Vivus

talents.name: Strain Susceptibility
effect: Your pursuit of Arcana expose you to Strain.
When you roll one of your Foci to invoke and Arcana, you gain Strain according to the result as soon as the Arcana effects resolve.
Strain accumulates over the course of your adventures, only reducing by 1d6 at the conclusion of a Waypoint.

You suffer the effects of Strain according to the Straing Effects Table table below. Strain Effects are cumulative:
Strain Effect
0-4 No effect
5-9 Fatigued 1
10-14 Confused
15-19 Fatigued 2
20-24 Vulnerable 3
25-29 Stunned 4
30+ Dead

talents.name: Manage Strain
effect: Use your Insight to reduce your current Strain by Hits.

talents.name: Insight (3)
effect: Increase your Insight rating to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Foci (2)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Foci (2)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Foci (3)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Prepare concoctions
effect: Craft

talents.name: Sneak Attack
effect: When you successfully attack a target while Hidden, add +1d6 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Powerlifter
effect: Exert yourself to accomplish a feat of strength, adding +1d4 bonus hits to the result set.

talents.name: Sprinter
effect: When you Shift to move to an adjacent Zone, you may move an additional Zone.

talents.name: Brutal Strike
effect: Strike one target with unrelenting force, adding +1d4 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Last Stand
effect: Exert yourself when you are below your maximum Grit.  Regain +Hits to your Primary Defense and reduce the Challenge by 1d.

talents.name: Exert (2)
effect: Increase your Exert rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Channeling
effect:
When you gain this Talent, select 2 Power Skills from the list below to be your Channeler Foci. When you use this ability, prepare Powers that draw from these Skills:
- Inferno, Lux, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest, Torrent

Endure to draw the forces to your will. Gain Hits + Steady ranks to prepare your Techniques.
You Techniques have the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 4
- Backlash: Recoil - If a Power results in Hits less than Threshold, all targets within your Current Zone sustain Hits from the Power's effect equal to the total amount below Threshold.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 3 - Steady Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.name: Foci (2)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Foci (2)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Foci (3)
effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Defensive Stance
effect: Focus to defend yourself in combat, adding +Hits to your Primary Defense.

talents.name: Harm's Way
effect: Focus to protect an ally in your Zone. Before the beginning of your next turn, you may redirect a number of Hits against that ally to yourself equal to the Hits in your Focus result set.

talents.name: Indomitable Presence
effect: Intimidate your opponents, causing them to hesitate. Add +2 to the current Timer.

talents.name: Focus (2)
effect: Increase your Focus rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Investigate (2)
effect: Increase your Focus rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Browbeat
effect: Intimidate your target outside of combat, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: It's all a facade
effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.name: Persuade (2)
effect: Increase your Persuade rating to 2 (d8)

talents.name: Deceive (2)
effect: Increase your Deceive rating to 2 (d8)

talents.name: Unflappable
effect: When you Recover to regain Nerve, regain and additional +1d4 Bonus Hits.

talents.name: Persuade (3)
effect: Increase your Persuade rating to 3 (d10)

talents.name: Deceive (3)
effect: Increase your Deceive rating to 3 (d10)

talents.name: Silver Tongue
effect: Persuade your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Quick Draw
effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.name: Riposte
effect: Counterattack an enemy Strike that just scored 0 Hits.  Deal 1d4 bonus Hits.

talents.name: Embrace the cycle
effect:
When you gain this Talent, increase you Vivus Skill rating to 2 (d8).
Use your Composure to let the cylce of life and death flow through you. Gain Hits + Steady Power ranks to prepare your Powers.
You Powers gain the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 3
- Backlash:Drain - If a Power results in Hits less than Threshold, you suffer a number of Hits equal to the total amount below Threshold as the cyle extracts its toll on you.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 4 - Savvy Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.name: Study the arcane
effect:
When you gain this Talent, increase you rating in any 2 Power Skills from the list below:
- Aether, Arithm, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nihil, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest , Torrent

Research to memorize spells. Gain Hits + Savvy Power ranks to prepare your Powers.
You Powers gain the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 4
- Backlash: Spellburn - If a Power results in Hits greater than Threshold, you suffer a number of Hits equal to the total amount above Threshold. Your target(s) sustain Spellburn Hits as well, in addition to the Power's effect.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 6 - Savvy Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.name: Aim
effect: Use a Shift to aim carefully, then immediately Shoot your target at -1d Challenge.  Add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set (bonus Hits do not count 1s against Initiative).

talents.name: Ready
effect: You can use the Use Your Equipment Shift to reload, draw, or restring / unjam a ranged weapon once per turn without using your Shift.

talents.name: Shoot (2)
effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Double Tap
effect: Shoot your target at +2d Challenge.

talents.name: Shoot (3)
effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Shooter
effect: When you Shoot your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Controlled Pair
effect: When you Shoot a target with no 1s in the result set, you may immediately make a second Shoot attempt.

talents.name: Float like a butterfly. . .
effect: Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

talents.name: Martial Arts (2)
effect: Increase your Martial Arts rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Parry
effect: When your Reflexes defense is above 0 take Hits in melee combat from an attacker you can see, reduce your Reflexes by 1 and reduce the Hits by 3.

talents.name: Dual Strike
effect: You can split Hits scored by your Martial Arts between 2 melee targets in your Current Zone.

talents.name: Living Weapon
effect: When you use your Martial Arts against your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Sweep the Leg
effect: Use your Martial Arts against your target at -2 Hits, but making them Prone.

talents.name: Counterstrike
effect: When you Parry a melee attack, immediately use your Martial Arts against the attack at -1 Challenge.

talents.name: First Aid
effect: Administer basic care to an injury.

talents.name: Coordinated Assault
effect: Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated attack against a single target, dealing Hits +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Invoke the divine
effect: Composure

talents.name: Derive axioms
effect: Analyze

talents.name: Hone the mind
effect: Focus

talents.name: Shoot (3)
effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Skirmisher
effect: When you Shift to move within your current Zone and attack a target, you may spend 1 Hit to Shift again this turn.

talents.name: Skirmisher
effect: When you Shift to move within your current Zone and attack a target, you may spend 1 Hit to Shift again this turn.

talents.name: Knowledge is Power
effect: Research to gain critical information about the current situation.  Increase the current Timer by Hits - 2 and decrease the Challenge by -1d.

talents.name: Linguistic Aptitude
effect: Use Linguistics to speak or decipher any language.  Create +Hits Advantages you can spend on Persuade or Invesitgate.

talents.name: Analytical Mind
effect: Analyze your surroundings, gaining insights into potential weaknesses or hidden detail.  Create Hits +2 Advantages in your current Zone.  Allies can use these Advantages if you are able to communicate with them.

talents.name: Forked Tongue
effect: Deceive your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: It's all a facade
effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.name: Fighter
effect: When you Strike your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Float like a butterfly. . .
effect: Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

talents.name: Strike (2)
effect: Increase your Strike rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Cleave
effect: When you Strike your target to death, apply Hits -2 to another target in your current Zone.

talents.name: Combat Reflexes
effect: When a hostile target Shifts away from you in melee combat, they add an additional Hazard die to their next roll.

talents.name: Strike (3)
effect: Increase your Strike rating to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Peer through depths
effect: Perceive

talents.name: Commune with spirits
effect: Persuade the spirits within.  Gain Hits + Savvy Power ranks.

talents.name: Overwatch
effect: When one or more hostile targets moves into your current Zone, you may deal 1d4 bonus Hits to one of them.

talents.name: Zero in
effect: When you Aim, add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Aim
effect: Use a Shift to aim carefully, then immediately Shoot your target at -1d Challenge.  Add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set (bonus Hits do not count 1s against Initiative).

talents.name: Charge
effect: Use a Shift to move into an adjacent Zone, then immediately Strike your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.name: Quick Draw
effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.name: Combat Training
effect: You may Strike or Shoot at a target and use a Shift to use a non-combat skill.  Roll +2d Challenge.  Divide the Hits between the the two skills.

talents.name: It's all a facade
effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.name: Master Eavesdropp
effect: Perceive a private conversation while Hidden to gather information.  Ignore 1s in the result set.

talents.name: Quick Draw
effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.name: Fall Back
effect: Lead allies in your current and all adjacent Zones in a tactical retreat, allowing a number of allies equal to Hits in the result set to immediately Shift away from hostile targets without risk.

talents.name: Inspire Allies
effect: Lead all allies in your current Zone, allowing a number of them equal to the Hits in the result set to choose 1 of the following: Recover, Take -1d to their next Action, add 1 Hit to their next result set

talents.name: Reposition
effect: Lead allies in your current Zones, allowing a number of them equal to the Hits in the result set to immediately use a Shift.

talents.name: Exert (2)
effect: Increase your Exert rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Endure (2)
effect: Increase your Endure rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Endure (3)
effect: Increase your Endure rating to 3 (d10).

talents.name: Hard to Kill
effect: Increase your Grit by 3.

talents.name: I can take it
effect: When you take more than 1 Hit from an effect, reduce the total Hits by 1.

talents.name: Shake it off
effect: Use a Shift to Recover.

talents.name: Taunt
effect: Intimidate all hostile targets in your current Zone, +nd Challenge.  Until the beginning of your next turn, a number of hostiles equal to the Hits in your result set target only you.

talents.name: Walk it off
effect: When you Recover, regain +2 Defenses.

talents.name: Implements (2)
effect: Increase your Implements rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Legerdemain (2)
effect: Increase your Legerdemain rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Stealth (2)
effect: Increase your Stealth rating to 2 (d8).

talents.name: Suplex
effect: Grapple your target, adding +1d4 bonus Hits and making them Prone.
